text:
When using the command 
ant -find template.xml -projecthelp 
ant -projecthelp -find template.xml 
to go and find the template.xml and display the targets of that buildfile.
The buildfile is found but NO target information is displayed.

on the contrary
using the command
ant -projecthelp -find
ant -find build.xml -projecthelp
DO work... 

So if i rename my template.xml to build.xml everything would be OK. But i do 
not want that.
I think this is a bug.
creator: demeester_roel@yahoo.com
holtdl@yahoo.com
text:
It works for me:
$ ant -find main.xml -projecthelp
Searching for main.xml ...
Buildfile: c:\TEMP\main.xml
Main targets:
Subtargets:
 compile
 main
Default target: main

(Also with the params order switched around.)
Same as with Diane, works for me in both invocations.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
